sections.heading: Limitation of municipal taxing powers [For application of this section, see 79 Del
sections.text:
Laws, c. 382, § 2 and 80 Del. Laws, c. 140, § 3].(a) Every municipal corporation in this State, regardless of population, shall only have the power to impose, levy, assess, or collect a tax of any kind whatsoever as
§

 1;80 Del. Laws, c. 140,

§

 2;
